conclusion: Analyze the forces acting on both the wooden block P and the long wooden board ab.
The weight of the block P is mg.
The normal force exerted by the board ab on the block P is N_P = mg.
The kinetic frictional force exerted by the board ab on the block P is f_{kP} = μ2 mg.
The direction of the kinetic frictional force f_{kP} is opposite to the direction of motion of P, i.e., to the left.
The weight of the board ab is Mg.
The normal force exerted by the ground on the board ab is N_{ab} = (M + m)g.
The kinetic frictional force exerted by the block P on the board ab is f_{kab} = μ2 mg.
The direction of the kinetic frictional force f_{kab} is to the right.
The static frictional force exerted by the ground on the board ab is f_s.
Since the board ab is stationary, the net force acting on it must be zero, implying f_s must balance f_{kab}.
The static frictional force f_s is equal in magnitude but opposite in direction to f_{kab}: f_s = μ2 mg.
The magnitude of the frictional force exerted by the ground on the long wooden board ab is μ2 mg.
